cabin.content:
• Queen size bed in bedroom - Brand new Sealy Posturepedic added Jun 2011.
  • Queen hide-a-bed in living area
  • Carpeted loft area for sleeping bags or a queen size air mattress
  • Air conditioning, heat, two ceiling fans
  • Shower/tub, toilet, sink, vanity, hot water
  • Refrigerator, stove top, sink, small counter top, microwave, dishes, glassware, pots & pans, utensils
  • Table with four chairs
  • Fire ring for camp fires with "starter" supply of firewood
  • Linens and plush towels will be provided (Brand new Jun 2011)
  • TV with DVD player
